001package com.github.nradov.abnffuzzer;
002
003import static org.junit.Assert.assertTrue;
004
005import java.io.IOException;
006import java.io.InputStream;
007import java.net.Inet6Address;
008import java.net.InetAddress;
009import java.net.URISyntaxException;
010
011import org.junit.Test;
012
013/**
014 * Test the {@link InetAddress} class.
015 *
016 * @author Nick Radov
017 */
018public class InetAddressTest {
019
020        @Test
021        public void testGetByName() throws IOException, URISyntaxException {
022                final InputStream is = this.getClass().getResourceAsStream("/rfc3986.txt");
023                final Fuzzer f = new Fuzzer(is);
024
025                for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {
026                        final String ipV6Address = f.generateAscii("IPv6address");
027                        final InetAddress inetAddress = InetAddress.getByName(ipV6Address);
028                        assertTrue(inetAddress instanceof Inet6Address);
029                }
030        }
031
032}
